abstract: Catholic Charities of the Archdiocese of New York, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Melissa Ferrer move to safer home and pay for school clothes for her children.

headline.print_headline: Raising 5 Sons Alone, 3 With Autism, Takes a Toll
headline.main: Raising 5 Sons Alone, 3 With Autism, Takes a Toll on a Mother’s Body

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Melissa Ferrer, 33, loses her hair in clumps from the stress of caring for her children, all of whom have spent portions of their childhoods in New York City’s shelter system....
lead_paragraph: Melissa Ferrer, 33, loses her hair in clumps from the stress of caring for her children, all of whom have spent portions of their childhoods in New York City’s shelter system.
